title: Pohnpei Business Expo 2025
description: A showcase of local businesses, entrepreneurs, and startups in Pohnpei. Network with professionals, discover new opportunities, and learn about business trends in the region.

title: Sunset Networking Mixer
description: A relaxed evening of networking by the water. Meet fellow business owners and professionals while enjoying refreshments and the beautiful Pohnpeian sunset.

title: Small Business Development Workshop
description: Learn essential skills for growing your business, from marketing strategies to financial management. Featuring expert speakers and hands-on activities.

title: Kolonia Clean & Green Initiative
description: Join local businesses and community members in a cleanup and beautification project for Kolonia. A great way to give back and promote environmental responsibility.

title: Pohnpei Business Leaders Gala
description: An elegant evening celebrating the achievements of Pohnpeiâ€™s top businesses and entrepreneurs. Enjoy dinner, entertainment, and awards presentations.

title: Tourism & Hospitality Summit
description: A discussion on the future of tourism in Pohnpei. Industry leaders, hotel operators, and tour guides come together to strategize sustainable growth.

title: Young Entrepreneurs Forum
description: A platform for aspiring young business owners to pitch ideas, receive mentorship, and connect with investors and experienced entrepreneurs.
